original_title: Move Over Johnny, Here Comes Big Dan
overview: When a sex-crazed artist illustrates his wildest deepest fantasies, they come to life in a tableau of smoldering sensuality. From Harleys to fair-haired young men, his artistic dreaming runs the erotic gamut, culminating in the final exposure of hung newcomer Dan LeGreid.
title: Move Over Johnny, Here Comes Big Dan
